title: Room Lamp Control
desc: Room Lamp Control – A smart lamp control system built with Arduino and Bluetooth communication. The device can be operated manually via physical switch or remotely through a mobile app.

title: QR Code Presence System
desc: QR Code Presence System – A modern attendance system using QR Codes. Users can scan a QR code via their smartphone to mark presence, with data automatically stored in the database and displayed in real-time on the dashboard.

title: Tempereture and Humidity Monitor
desc: Smart home IoT kit available for purchase on the marketplace.
